name: ProjectBread
description: Project Bread is a semi-open world, FPS roguelike game in which players take control of a robotic character armed with a basic gun and tasked with fighting through a multitude of enemies. By defeating enemies players have a chance at acquiring an artifact in which on collection, boost one of the players stats. Once the player is satisfied with the amount of upgrades they've acquired they can go and challenge the level's boss. If the player successfully defeats the boss they earn a unique and powerful artifact and are allowed to progress to the next stage. However, if a player is unable to defeat the boss they'll be wiped of all of their artifacts and forced to restart from the beginning.
